channel.title: Error connecting to server on client heellppppp!
channel.description: ok i have one of those open source clients and i didnt want to have a running server in my back ground so i could connect to other peoples server with my. client so i tryed to change the ip in client.java from 127.0.0.1 to wakescape.no-ip.org and now when i try to connect i get "error connecting to server" cansomeone help?

becasue that what i did…
